content_html: In Kathmandu, the chairman of the CPN Maoist Centre, Pushpa Kamal Dahal 'Prachanda', has announced plans to build a grand new office building for the party. This announcement comes after protesters set the party's existing office in Paris Danda on fire during the recent Janjati movement. Prachanda declare

title: Prachanda Announces Plan for a Grand New Party Office
